title: New skins not in gifting menu
body: I was trying to buy darkstar thresh for a friend, and when i went to the gifting center i couldnt gift that, despite the fact that i know he owns the champ, and not the skin. I checked by 'trying' to gift it to other friends who also fit the bill and it doesnt show up for them either.

replies.body: Unfortunately, due to in iin-game bug, we've disabled him both in game and in the shop (we didn't want players buying something they couldn't use). We're working on a fix at the moment, and as soon ass the fix is deployed to live, he'll be added to the shop and available for purchase and gifting.
Its currently disabled because of a bug. Rito is making me cry qq
